markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Wellspring Mage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3029) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Class" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=397" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 249 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wellspring Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=104)

**Prerequisites**
wellspring magic

</column>

---

There's no longer a limit on how many temporary spell slots you can gain per day from wellspring magic.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you gain two other feats from the wellspring mage archetype.

<title level="2">Wellspring Mage Dedication leads to...</title>
[Interfering Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3032), [Urgent Upwelling](/Feats.aspx?ID=3031), [Wellspring Control](/Feats.aspx?ID=3030)
name: Wellspring Mage Dedication
